title: 天狼星奇谭 Tales of Sirius

details.Title: 天狼星奇谭 Tales of Sirius

description: 《天狼星奇谭》是一款像素风格的轻解谜+冒险ARPG。 玩家在游戏中将扮演M市市立中学的普通高中生七叶，因一通神秘的匿名电话而起，由此踏上了寻找自己神秘失踪姐姐的冒险之旅。 在游戏时间为一个假期的游戏流程中，七叶将与自己社团“神研部”的小伙伴们一起穿梭在城市之中，解开谜题，进行战斗，与各方势力周旋，逐渐探寻到事情的真相。 但是，事态真的会像普通的热血冒险故事一样发展吗？

title: M-1グランプリへの道　～俺たちの出囃子はもう鳴っている～

details.Title: M-1グランプリへの道　～俺たちの出囃子はもう鳴っている～

description: This is an exciting horizontal scrolling action game set in the world of "M-1 Grand Prix". Numerous rivals stand in the way stopping you, a comedian duo, from reaching the stage. Who will be waiting for you when they reach the final stage?

title: 捍卫SafeGuard
description: This game is a first person shooting game, players could choose different characters to join match, cooperate to occupy the stronghold.

title: Rainboy
description: Rainboy is a precision platformer with 100s of exhilarating levels! You were brought into this universe knowing nothing... Join Rainboy and Dart on a journey around the world as they discover the meaning of their existence!

title: Kamiwaza: Way of the Thief
description: Join honorable thief Ebizo on the streets of Mikado, and put your thieving skills to the test! Will you walk the path of honor for the sake of family? The choice is yours to make.

title: StudioS Fighters: Climax Champions
description: An entire generation of StudioS characters all fighting to be #1! Fight your way to the top with satisfying and easy to execute combos! A unique retro-style game inspired by 90s era handheld fighting games!

title: Dr. Chatelet: Faith 神医
description: Amputations, bloodletting, alchemy - all of which seem unthinkable today - were the treatment options that medieval doctors revered. You must face challenges one after another and experience gains and losses in the course of your constant adventures

title: Anode Heart
description: A semi-open world monster tamer RPG, set in a futuristic environment where digital and analog reality have become indistinguishable from one another.

title: Never Out Of Time
description: Survive in an ocean of bullets by dodging, shooting at your foes and manipulating time. You can take as much time as you need and even "do over": YOU set the tempo of the action. Will you be able to conquer the space station?

title: Galactic Gym: Fitness Center Management
description: Can you run the galaxy’s greatest gym? Step into the shoes of a gym manager and fulfill the exercise dreams of your intergalactic customers! With equipment for numerous disciplines, varied exercise environments, and many employees to hire, you can create the best gym on this side of the Milky Way!

title: Super Gosu Cars
description: Arcade racing action mixed with kart racing combat! Up to 8 players in local multiplayer! Lots of different vehicles, drivers and tracks to try out and more yet to unlock! Go for gold in the Grand Prix! Hone your skills in Time Trial! Run wild in Custom Tournaments! - It's Super Gosu Cars time!

title: Shooting Covid
description: Years and years after the virus outbreak, humanity has been suffering. Alpha Zen sends their last hope, Bella, to save humankind from the apocalypse. Bella's mission to restore hope and hunting for vaccines is risky and hazardous. She cannot do this on her own. So, she needs the best sidekick, you.

title: Pixel Pirate
description: Pxel Pirate - 2D-platformer about pirates, made in pixel art.

title: Slurpy Derpy
description: Breed ever-stronger Derps. Use them to Bake, Conquer, Research and Evolve!

title: Dashing Orange
description: A 2D precision platformer about a little Orange that can dash and jump around this abstract world to avoid all the traps in the way to reach your goal.

title: Binary Run
description: The Reformat is inevitable. The Virus Spreads. Keep Running. Binary Run is a fast paced retro shooter inspired by 80s synthwave and retro shooters. Kill, collect and run your way through a corrupted digitial world, Keep Running.

title: Hand of Doom
description: Sign a contract in blood! Travel throughout the planes of existence slaying or befriending powerful doomlords in this wizard simulator inspired by the FMV games and dungeon crawlers of the early 90's. Learn powerful spells to solve puzzles and combat the dark forces amassing against you.

title: Cookie Cutter
description: Love turns to rage and chainsaws in Cookie Cutter, a techno-pop-punk 2D hand-drawn Metroidvania set to the backdrop of a bleak and beautiful dying world. Become Cherry, a rage-driven android on a quest to rescue her beloved creator, Doctor Shinji Fallon, from the clutches of a deranged mastermind.

title: Directly Drink Milk from Cow　【直に牛乳を飲め】

details.Title: Directly Drink Milk from Cow　【直に牛乳を飲め】

description: The main character comes to work part-time at a ranch and takes care of 16 Holstein cows and their calves. He has to chase the cows with his dog, milk the cows, feed them, and carry the milk in buckets slowly without spilling. You can also take a car to explore and talk to the villagers.

title: Light The Lamp Hockey
description: Old School Hockey Gaming in a Beer League coat of paint! Welcome to the most dynamic 8-ish bit hockey experience you could have ever asked for. Built on simplicity and full of depth, Take your team to the playoffs and win the almighty 'Ship!

title: Cordychosis
description: A point-and-click adventure game taking place within a single room. Equipped with some trash and a makeshift time machine, and aided by a neurotic version of yourself from 5 years ago, you must traverse time, collect objects, solve puzzles, befriend a large zombie bee, and escape the madness.

title: Kingdom Two Crowns

details.Title: Kingdom Two Crowns
details.Franchise: Kingdom, Raw Fury, Kingdom Two Crowns

description: In Kingdom Two Crowns, players must work in the brand-new solo or co-op campaign mode to build their kingdom and secure it from the threat of the Greed. Experience new technology, units, enemies, mounts, and secrets in the next evolution of the award-winning micro strategy franchise!

title: Wildlife Planet: The Incremental
description: Wildlife Planet is a Simulation & Idle game with the theme of wildlife and nature. You will unlock more and more species as you level up and learn the species knowledge. This is a game with refreshing scenes, immersive background music, and different kinds of wild animals and plants.

title: Little Ninja
description: You are a young 8 year old boy named Liam, you recently got a ninja mask for a birthday present! You must protect the house from evil doers! You must be sneaky, and make sure to not get caught!

title: Sanfu
description: 2000年，山城市新闻频道的电视画面莫名跳出一则旧广告，而广告的代言人是已经去世的特异功能少年——三眼神童。有传闻三眼神童的亡魂劫持了电视信号。 调查局受命展开调查。随着调查的深入，一个藏在黑暗处的犯罪团伙逐渐浮出水面。

title: Dimensional Drift
description: Race through 4 unique dimensions in a ton of different cars with arcade-style driving. Unleash your inner racer as you explore these beautiful worlds. Upgrade your cars, paint them, make them monster trucks. Put on your seat belt, lets do this.

title: Space Out
description: Space Out blends elements from Breakout, pinball, and a space shooter to provide a unique, fast-paced, and challenging arcade experience.

title: Linelith
description: Solve puzzles embedded in rocks and crystals as you explore a colorful, serene alien asteroid. Discover a few clever twists as you progress in this short and sweet puzzle experience.

title: Meowtopia: Expedition
description: “Meowtopia: Expedition” is a cat-themed and heart-warming Match 3 game. Join and experience the urban fairy tale between Xiaoxiao and “Toffee” the cat, dress yourself up with a cat-themed fashion style, and decorate your own cozy home!

title: Power (of) Metal
description: Power (of) Metal is a 2D hack/slash platformer, journey of Maleqqi who want to fulfill his emptiness inside of him and he will find the Power (of) Metal

title: Neon Outlast
description: This is a Challenging FPS game which you can act as a soldier, who lost in the slum and surrounded by terrorists, all you have to do is breakthrough all the enemies and escape in the limited time.

title: Base Craft: Desolate Survival
description: Co-op twin-stick base building survival game.

title: Unmurk
description: You only see the outer edges of the puzzle. Put the puzzles back into place to reveal a hidden voxel object.

title: Varmalis
description: Old-school psychological horror inspired by Silent Hill series, based on exploration of abandoned places, combat with monsters, puzzles solving and objects and texts to find. Vincent remembers a murder he never witnessed. What if his memories were mixed with those of a real killer?

title: For Your Information
description: First person team multiplayer game. On closed map, battle between Guards and Spies. Spies team need to find locked filling cabinet and documents with parts of the password. Guards team need to find Spies, judging on the basis of spy movement or behavior.

title: QUIJOTE: Quest for Glory
description: QUIJOTE: Quest for Glory is a tactical card strategy game based on the work of Miguel de Cervantes. Lead Don Quixote on his heroic journey and experience some of the most familiar episodes of the classic novel published in the 17th century.

title: Lost In The Space
description: Lost In The Space combines frantic top-down action with fast, fluid and very addictive gameplay, with instant response to player commands

title: Word Crystal
description: A daily word guessing game with four linked words of five letters apiece.

title: Aledorn
description: Spiritual successor to many old school hard-core RPG/Dungeon masterpieces, that combines tactical combat system, exploration in the first person view and intriguing travelling system between main map locations.

title: Stellarium
description: Ride around the many galaxies of Stellarium in a hectic vertical bullet hell, facing off all kinds of creatures and dodging giant storms of bullets.

title: DreamPusher
description: Easy operation with just a tap! It's a medal pusher game like in an arcade! The maximum number of JP payouts is 99999, which is a threat!

title: Nodes
description: An RPG where everything is drawn in a notebook

title: Robot-X
description: A fast-paced platform shooter inspired by 90s classics. Follow Robot-X on a journey to protect the city from a new danger, fight bosses and jump over pits in this retro experience.

title: Fruit Basket TV
description: Fruit Basket is the world's premier lethal obstacle course gameshow. Contestants run, jump, and dodge their way to a shot at one million credits, while the timer on their lives ticks down. Join the competition, shoot for the best times, and unlock the most fashionable of hats in order to stay alive.

title: Weakpoint Delta
description: Asteroids go boom. Zoom around in your lil' ship and learn how to accurately hit weakpoints on asteroids to extract the precious crystals within allowing you to purchase upgrades.

title: Building destruction
description: Building destruction - an exciting physical game aimed at destroying buildings and various structures.

title: Battle of the Four Towers
description: Take command of a tower as you battle 3 others in a game of strategy and wits. Each round, pick up to 3 actions, either attack another tower or defend from another tower. If you manage to attack a tower, then they lose 3 Life Points, but if they defend they lose nothing.

title: Twilight's Final Judgement
description: Twilight's Final Judgement is a noir turn-based RPG. Players will explore a 1940s New York where the secret elites of the world are the Greek Gods. You will level up and build upon 4 playable characters. Players will also talk with NPCs learn secret lore and form bonds.

title: RecMaster Pro - Gameplay & Screen Recorder
description: RecMaster Pro is a super-easy and lightweight gameplay recorder, screen recorder, and audio recorder. It helps record HD/4K videos with the best quality and the smallest file size automatically without complicated settings. The advanced settings are also available and easy with clicks!

title: Psycho Crab
description: A 2D physics platformer with an unusual control scheme, Psycho Crab is a game where you will fall down. A lot. Possibly into lava.

title: Venture Towns
description: Make your own metropolitan utopia! Stores, mansions, towers--anything goes!

title: Pocket League Story
description: Train your team to battle to the top in this sensational soccer team simulation!

title: xVATrainer
description: xVATrainer is a UI-based machine learning app used for training TTS voice models using video game voices, for use in xVASynth.

title: American Catur/Traditional
description: If “chess is the gymnasium of the mind,” as French scientist and philosopher Blaise Pascal once said, then I say "American Catur is the Full-Distance Ironman Triathlon of the mind" CEO Eric J Curtis. We have two fundamental tactic offensive and defensive bombs controlled with a roll 6 & 8 sided die

title: Whiskered Away
description: Whiskered Away is a fun, stress-free 2D platformer starring Gilbert and Skye!

title: Slopecrashers
description: Slopecrashers is an arcade snowboard combat racer in which a wild crew of animals band together on a world spanning snowboarding tour! Do stunts & combos for extra boost and collect items to protect yourself or attack the competitors! You can ride on your own, or battle it out in local multiplayer!

title: Shady Business
description: Shady business - The security of your homeland is under threat! Take control of the plane and destroy the rising threat before it destroys you in this sidescroller shooter!

title: Fun Quest
description: Fun quest - Relive the old days with this arcade game inspired by genre pioneers like breakout and pong. Clear the playing field from blocks, collect bonuses and try to beat your own record in this game!

title: Respawn
description: You're a clone of Kane Hartman. You woke up to take part in an AI driven experiment to find the source of the human will to survive. Fight your way through countless robotic opponents and break free from the maze!

title: Far Star
description: Far Star is a story-driven action-adventure game with Metroidvania influences. There is something fishy going on in this galaxy, but this won’t stop your intergalactic general services crew from doing their job using a varied set of skills, weapons and outfits.

title: Keylocker | Turn Based Cyberpunk Action
description: In a silent world where music has been prohibited, B0B0 will serenade her rebellion against the vicious authorities by banding together with the Jukebot drummer, Rocket, to shatter the strings of fate and sing the melody of freedom in this unforgiving Rhythm Turn Based JRPG.

title: The Sinking Structure, Clione, and Lost Child -Log4

details.Title: The Sinking Structure, Clione, and Lost Child -Log4

description: Two silent wanderers,6 full chapters,A game of exploration and adventure

title: Deadland 4000
description: A post-apocalyptic roguelike that's easy to learn and hard to master. Scavenge loot, sneak past enemies, and survive by any means necessary in the year 4000

title: Cloak & Dagger: Shadow Operations
description: A single player story-driven, third person, tactical stealth action game set in the early 1990's. Use the shadows as a weapon, shoot out lights, blind enemies, and strike from the darkness.

title: Pizza Synthwave
description: You’re a parkouring astronaut in a retro-neon dreamlike world hurling trough the vastness of space in order to get the last slice of pizza. Wallrun, jump, climb, use your grappling hook and portals to get the fastest time! For fans of Mirror's Edge, Beat Saber and CS:GO Surfing.

title: Vitality Girl Ⅲ:Pixel
description: The game tells the story of a sinful city where a mysterious assassination organization was born. Players play as a trainee assassin in this killer organization. As long as one more task is completed, he can become a full member, but he has also discovered a shocking secret.

title: The 8 Sins: New Hell Order
description: Turn-based horror strategy game with RPG elements where the action takes place in hell, player take lead one of 8 demonic races that each of them represents one of 7 Deadly Sins (the 8th sin is Acedia).

title: Virium
description: Navigate and explore the twisted organic world with the ability to walk on anything! Climb large creatures, solve puzzles, unlock different forms and abilities, and uncover secrets in this atmospheric Puzzle-Metroidvania.

title: Stay away from zombies
description: When you wake up, you find that you are in some unfamiliar gloomy place, reminiscent of an old abandoned basement.

title: CRASH TEST IDIOT
description: You must destroy every car in the city.

title: SCALEPLANET
description: Somewhere in the third dimension there lives an alien Joe. He can't sit still. He constantly travels and explores the world and galaxies. This time he came across a new planet.

title: Frontier Fortress - Tower Defense
description: Frontier Fortress is medieval-themed tower defense game. You are the leader of your nation. In the harsh medieval age you have to defend your land against foreign invaders. Fortify your frontier with defense structures and let none of them pass through your fortress.

title: The Reflection
description: The Reflection explores the connection to an alternate dimension that contains all the matter of the world inverted. From the surface, there appears to be simply a reflection of light, but submerging into the water reveals that this world is completely tangible, mirroring the world perfectly.

title: Protect Ukraine
description: This is a casual game that requires a defensive strategy. Build your own weapon facility, your goal is to destroy the enemy and defend Ukraine.

title: Cosmic Ball Tournament
description: Cosmic Ball Tournament is a single-player, first-person platforming arcade game where your objective is to quickly get through stages whilst accumulating a high score. Use speed and precision to progress and become the Cosmic Ball Champion!

title: The Original Wizard
description: The game is a Dungeon Crawler, where the player must survive the succeeding dungeons and defeat Impeficus on his throne.

title: The Testing Chamber
description: For every action, there is a reaction... For every choice, a result... Dive deep into your subconscious as you wander the halls of The Testing Chamber & join hundreds of thousands of other players in one of the biggest & most successful social experiments ever performed.

title: Hero Ring
description: "Hero Ring" is a 2D-platformer arena shooter in which you have to destroy the monsters that appear from the portals. Firearms will help you with this!

title: Conflict 3048
description: Real-time strategy and tactics on an alien world! Command super space soldiers against an array of alien hordes. Commander - we need you!

title: Between Horizons
description: Between Horizons is a narrative 2.5D sci-fi detective adventure. 33 years into the Zephyr's journey, its mission is suddenly jeopardized. Can you find the culprit before it's too late? Experience an enthralling story set in a semi-open world that branches and ends based on your choices.

title: Towerland
description: Fight monsters and creatures in this 2D top down adventure and free the land of Towerland from the threat of Diabot!

title: Land Above Sea Below
description: Land Above Sea Below calm landscape-building puzzle game with strategy elements, you have to grow your island’s area and height by placing infinitely available tiles one after one. These procedurally generated tiles ensure that every island you make, every game you play will be different.

title: BrVR Backrooms Virtual Reality
description: BrVR Backrooms VR is a virtual reality survival horror game inspired by The Backrooms. The Backrooms are out of the boundaries of the real world and can only be accessed by no-clipping through a floor or wall in a place that inspires deja vu or an uncomfortable feeling of nostalgia.

title: The Dream Team
description: A fanmade game about Mr. Fruit and the Dream Team. A semi-linear turnbased RPG puzzle game where you play as Fruit, Rob, Blue, and Poppy to save reality from permanent sleep. Plenty of references, and a story deep enough to have things to spoil.

title: RC Death Race: Multiplayer
description: "RC Death Race" - is a Racing Multiplayer RC Electric Car Combat game. You'll get to drive, shoot and and ram opponents in over 60,000 unique tracks. Destroy your friends in this demented shooting racing game using attack and defense powerups and be the first to see the checkered flag. ;)

title: Mystery Solitaire. Powerful Alchemist 2
description: Return to the Middle Ages and become a powerful alchemist! This is a new sequel to the beloved game.

title: Mystery Solitaire. Grimm's Tales 5
description: Help Little Red Riding Hood reach her grandmother's house and protect her from the evil gray wolf.

title: 1001 Jigsaw. Cute Cats
description: A new game in the series of 1001 Puzzles. Cute, funny, cozy cats will melt even the coldest hearts! Assemble the puzzle pieces and enjoy the cute faces of pets.

title: 1001 Jigsaw. Wild Animals
description: Another new addition to the 1001 Puzzle series. Amazing wild animals in their natural habitat! Put the puzzle pieces together and observe the habits.

title: Package Inspector
description: Plunge into the dystopian land of Taxien and check packages at the local customs office! Which packages need to be sorted out? Which ones support the rebels and which ones support the state? Which side will you choose? And will you earn enough to pay your useless taxes?

title: Spoils Of War
description: Spoils of war - Dirty thieves have made their way into your treasury and are trying to take out all the spoils of war! What does the insatiable spirit of destruction and revenge do in such a case? Treats guests with plasma clots and guards his treasures!

title: Lucky Villager
description: Lucky villager - The luckiest villager goes hunting for gold! Take all the treasure from the evil leprechauns before they chop you into juicy bacon in this hardcore platformer!

title: IT Simulator
description: IT Simulator is a co-op horror game where two players attempt to return power to an office building. Take the role of the all-seeing Control Room or the stealthy Repair Technician as you risk everything to d̶i̶s̶c̶o̶v̶e̶r̶ ̶t̶h̶e̶ ̶t̶r̶u̶t̶h̶ escape.

title: TAGLINE
description: TAGLINE a lightning fast, graffiti based shooter set in a loud, wild world sprinkled with street art, hip-hop, and towering skyscrapers.Snatch tags off the walls of this funky metropolis to overcome an array of enemies and challenges!

title: Pet Vet 3D Animal hospital Down Under

details.Title: Pet Vet 3D Animal hospital Down Under

description: Cuddle and play with lots of exciting animals, including sleek dolphins and bouncy kangaroos! Earn the animals trust by caring, feeding and petting them. Lot of work to be done in Pet Vet 3D Animal hospital Down Under!

title: Pet Vet 3D Wild Animal Hospital
description: Be animal doctor to cute baby elephants, frisky zebra foals, adorable lion and leopard cubs and more! Help them get better by examining them and helping them heal.

title: Apparatus

details.Title: Apparatus
details.Release Date: Hopefully this year lol, probably not Dec10th.

description: Lost, trapped, and alone within the Delta Labs. You must find your way out with your life, any slight mess-up could be your life in this 2D story platformer

title: Chico and the Magic Orchards
description: Solve puzzles by rolling a giant walnut in this retro-handheld-inspired adventure. Explore a variety of levels each with unique mechanics. Help Chico build his winter stash and find his way home!

title: SquareMan
description: Reminiscent of Jump King and Celeste. Henry (SquareMan) has fallen off a Cliff and into a the Caverns of Squared. Attain Willpower and escape via the bridge atop the mountain in this very punishing 2D Precision Platformer. Beware the Spikes and Slopes.

title: Six Aspects
description: Six Aspects may be the first Same Time Strategy (STS) game melding the tactical nature of turn based systems with the challenging demand of real time strategy.

title: DuckHunt - Missouri Kidz
description: Don't get fooled by the simple looks of this game! The way it is played is something unseen so far in the gaming world! Using a novel patented technology you and your friends will use your cellphones to aim at the screen and shoot! Show your friends who is a real gunslinger!

title: VR AirHockey / VR エアホッケー

details.Title: VR AirHockey / VR エアホッケー

description: Giant air field hockey played on a fantastic field.

title: Pocket Academy
description: Make your dream school in this management simulation game! School got you down?

title: The Sushi Spinnery
description: Revolutionize the revolving sushi bar in this fresh new sim!

title: Bullion - The Curse of the Cut-Throat Cattle

details.Title: Bullion - The Curse of the Cut-Throat Cattle

description: A frantic brawler for 1-4 players with a cast of bovine buccaneers and a unique blend of PvP and co-op gameplay: grab the most loot and stab your friends.... but be sure to keep at least one crewmate alive as you battle to become the sole survivor of the Curse of the Cut-Throat Cattle!

title: Cyberpulse
description: Slam your way through waves of viruses and hurl your friends through cyberspace in this flashy arcade thrower that combines classic twin-stick action with inventive physics for an electrifying adventure.

title: Terra Flame
description: Terra Flame is a side-scrolling shooter. The feature is that you can switch between various weapons.

title: Lenin Simulator
description: Lenin Simulator is a political simulator where you run Soviet Russia from 1920 to 1923. You have the potential to radically alter the decisions made and history as a whole.

title: Max Traffic
description: Max Traffic is a minimalistic traffic simulator.

title: Wizard of Hunting Life
description: Wizard of Hunting Life is an action RPG game. Hunt to level up, earn money to buy equipment and challenge stronger enemies.

title: Galaxy Splitter
description: Intergalactic combat with the vertical shooter

title: Emoji Merge - Puzzle Matching
description: Merge the Cat emojis and clear all the levels! Beautiful merging game with Cat emojis, to test your IQ ;)

title: TINY ISLANDS
description: TINY ISLANDS is a low poly Point&Click game where you have to find all the ancient artifacts in beautiful worlds.

title: Raid Off
description: Level up your guild in this MMO simulator. Then boss rush with your raiders in this real time strategy with pauses. As a guild leader, did you manage not to get overwhelmed in this fast-paced RTS ?

title: A List Of People Who Went Missing In The Scheleirland National Forest

details.Title: A List Of People Who Went Missing In The Scheleirland National Forest

description: A story about a woman who lives alone near the forest.

title: Hidden Objects: Tranquil Valley
description: Immerse yourself in the peaceful environment of Tranquil Valley. Find objects without pressure in Zen mode or put your sleuthing skills to the test in Time Attack mode.

title: DuckHunt - Missouri Kidz
description: Don't get fooled by the simple looks of this game! The way it is played is something unseen so far in the gaming world! Using a novel patented technology you and your friends will use your cellphones to aim at the screen and shoot! Show your friends who is a real gunslinger!

title: Splinters of Regret
description: Splinters of Regret is an atmospheric, action bullet hell where you fight your way through manifestations of your regrets.

title: Alcohol Empire
description: Alcohol Empire - unusual mixture of real-time strategy and card game. Use a variety of cards and a range of buildings you can buy or build to gain an advantage and defeat your opponents!

title: Fallen Legion Revenants
description: Your choices will decide the fates of many! Manipulate the castle above and lead heroes into battle in the world below in this real-time action RPG!

title: Build Lands
description: In Build Lands you will have fun and relax building cute islands, freeing your imagination and building your own cute islands, being able to share in the workshop where the community can download them to have fun assembling them! Relaxing fun for all ages!

title: Note Brawl
description: Go head-to-head in a game like soccer, but filled with colorful monsters! Note Brawl is a free-to-play fighting soccer game where you play with a diverse roster Every map and character is completely unique so there will always be something new to find out.

title: PunjiVR
description: PunjiVR is an unforgiving tactical shooter set during the Vietnam War, focusing on non-linearity and replayability with realism and historical accuracy in mind. This is not just "another VR shooter" or a tech demo. The jungle wants you dead, will you give in?

title: Belle Automata
description: Aureve is content with making tapestries alongside her master--but when he dies, his family sells her off to a reclusive buyer. Thrown into a world of other sentient droids, she must find her place and above all, answer the question: can an android truly feel?

title: Wobbl - The Lost Wands
description: Wobbl is a charming platformer about editing the level while playing it, to your advantage. The level is your playground - use Edit Wands in a selection of colourful levels to help you carve a path.

title: The Elevator Game
description: The Elevator Game is a simple game with only one purpose: to entertain the Player. Compatible with the Oculus Quest 2.

title: Jasper Vice: Legends Untold
description: Soar, dive, and explore the floating islands as a young Gryphon in this flying fantasy adventure. Delve into the lore and discover what it means to be a Voyager.

title: Ramen or Jail
description: The judge says “it’s Ramen... or Jail.” Not much choice, then. Grab ingredients, serve customers, and pay off your debt to society in this Match 3/Restaurant Management mashup from Weekend Panda Games!

title: Strongloween: The Escape
description: Live the adventure of Torkin, prisoner of STRONGLOWEEN. Discover powerful items and fight bosses that will prevent you and other prisoners from escaping. Strongloween holds many secrets, will you discover them all?

title: Codemakers!
description: Why are you here? what is going on? how did this happen? all will be answered in due time. until then, you must rebuild what is left of this universe, by harvesting code from the simulator and saving people and places. will you rebuild, or will you fall just like the last iteration?

title: Biggest Stream Hover Racing
description: Biggest Stream Hover Racing is a Twitch integrated racing game for windows. With up to 500 viewers racing against the streamer using ai controlled hover cars all kinds of mayhem and fun occurs for both you and your fans.

title: StereoPaint
description: StereoPaint is a VR 3d sculpting app that uses paint style interactions to create colorful voxelized models in real time. Manipulate virtual material as if it were clay using additive, subtractive or soft matter action.

title: 生人症候群
description: Be careful, there are monsters around you

title: Calmie Dots
description: Calmie Dots is a new take on the classic puzzle game. Relax, don't rush anywhere and just put all the spheres in the right places to pleasant, relaxing music!

title: 伏妖绘卷
description: 唐风还是和风，野史还是仙侠，一款全新画风的仙侠游戏等你来体验。

title: Air Museum VR
description: Virtual Reality based Aviation Museum Experience

title: PROTOZOA

title: Valley Dash
description: Dash! Dash! Dash as far as you can in this NES inspired arcade take on action command RPG battle action! Pick a dasher, collect gear, build your party and gather upgrades to dash as far as you possibly can.

title: Red Yet Capers: Math vs Mayhem

details.Title: Red Yet Capers: Math vs Mayhem

description: Red Yet Capers is a mix of mathematics, and fun-filled running, jumping, shooting, and ducking. For ages 8 and up.

title: Frame - Portals on Steroids
description: Frames are devices that can stitch two parts in space together. And they can do much more: They can move, change size and gravity of objects and appear in any size or number... All these mechanics are used to provide mind-bending levels in this logic-based physics-puzzler.

title: Chest Mate
description: A precision based tower defense/puzzle game that focuses on optimization! Control your cannon, optimize your defenses and defend your mate! Chest Mate is a challenging aim-based strategy game.

title: WTC : Recruitment Day
description: After Grendel Jinx is mugged, she chases after the thief, determined to retrieve her possessions - and also recruit the person responsible

title: Synthwave Racers
description: Race at hypersonic speeds through retro-inspired courses in Synthwave RacersⓇ, an indie-arcade racing game with melodic 80's-inspired synthwave tracks, and tight percision-based action racing gameplay.

title: Babba Yagga: Woodboy
description: Baba Yaga is a horror game, where you play as a wooden boy who needs to bring sleeping herbs for his mum, but on the way, he meets the BABA YAGA! After that everything becomes more brutal and scary.

title: Sahara's Underworld
description: Sahara's Underworld is a roguelike dungeon crawler game with a mixture of procedural generated and predefined maps. Explore a forgotten temple in search of the Relics of Horus. Make your way through the mysterious rooms of the temple and face a variety of enemies, puzzles and other challenges...

title: Employee A
description: A pixel art point-and-click adventure set in the heart of the modern-day high tech industry, which will test your logic and deductive reasoning skills as you investigate the murder mystery that's upturned your life.

title: Eftu
description: In a world threatened by a mysterious interdimensional entity, pick your guild, pick your ship, and pick your battles! Compete with other guilds for resources in a variety of game modes, including Team Versus, Battle Royale, and Racing!

title: Divine Combat
description: Divine Combat is a turn-based strategy game wherein you lead a team to victory against another team. The fights are in top-down view on a grid, much like similar turn-based unit management games. There is no penalty for losing.

title: SworLd
description: SworLd is a physics-based VR action game. You can compete with other players with cold weapons like swords and spears.

title: Dial-In
description: Traverse the analogue signals of an old TV in Dial-In! A reflex-based puzzle platformer that takes you through many varying channels, each with their own unique themes and music. Explore Over 100 Stages with classic and modern takes on platforming formulas, all in an immersive 2D style.

title: SnakeByte
description: Snakebyte is a fast-pace Snake-like arcade game that will bring back couch-based multiplayer and make your friends scream 'BYTE ME!'. Plenty of bits for every snake.... or are there?

title: 零之战线
description: 《零之战线》是一款二次元放置类的竖版游戏，玩家作为军校毕业的优等生，将指挥武器少女战队与被污染的机械兽战斗，在夺回地面控制权的同时，迎击与调查隐藏在深处的秘密。请一起守护这个世界！战斗吧！

title: Magic crystals 2
description: "Magic Crystals 2" is the second game of fun tower defense franchise with very unique mechanics - during the game you need to move crystals to the best places for the best defense. Don't forget to upgrade your crystals because enemies are stronger with every new wave!

title: NFT
description: Showcasing the power of n00dFighter Template! A comprehensive, ever growing, fighting game template, built with Unreal Engine!

title: Swords Fantasy: Battlefield
description: Swords Fantasy: Battlefield is a game from the 3rd person, including battles with swords.

title: Empty War
description: "You're the best warrior in your planet. Now your race want to conquert everything, and you're the only one to stop them."

title: Cardbuster
description: Collect and use the power of countless cards in a mysterious post apocalyptic town in this action-adventure-deckbuilder game.

title: Arachnophobia
description: Arachnophobia is a single-player first-person horror game. Find a way to escape the creepy crawlers that haunt the abandoned hotel. In this short indie horror game, the objective is to find the missing parts and build the equipment required to take down "Arachne"

title: Tiny Hill
description: Tiny hill - Are you ready to learn the story of a small hill? In this quirky hardcore platformer, you take on the role of a microscopic inhabitant of a small hill who is trying to collect as many coins as possible to fulfill his dream..

title: Retro three kingdoms : Special edition
description: We made the fun of MMORPG, the fun of hack and slash, and the fun of MOBA. We will do our best to become a game that records the history that players write. We do not provide auto-combat.

title: Kayak VR: Mirage
description: Kayak VR: Mirage is a jaw-dropping and exhilarating journey through beautiful locations, made for Virtual Reality. Maneuver our fully physically accurate kayak around checkpoints and crown yourself the fastest, or take it easy and use the free roam mode and enjoy the scenery.

title: Jumping Horses Champions
description: Raise Horses Champions and Manage your stud farm in a fun and challenging game. Join the Show Jumping World!

title: BrightSeeker
description: SHOOT, SLASH, BLOCK and DASH! Defeat dangerous war-mechs, upgrade your abilities and vanquish mystical and mechanical bosses on your journey through a world where magic and technology are at war.

title: Vamps For The Memories
description: Banter or die! Play two hunters who are racing to kill a vampire in a 90s JRPG style comedy. Solve puzzles, kill rats, and tolerate puns. It's like classic LucasArts made a Final Fantasy knock-off. The key to survival is exploring the world and finding things to talk about!

title: Burning Skies
description: 'Son, you are the last hope of the resistance to free the mankind from the claws of the General BLODMESTER and his terrible War Machines.'BURNING SKIES is a frantic roguelite vertical shmup, with huge boss fights, tons of threats, weapons and a unique atmosphere.

title: Immortal Love: True Treasure Collector's Edition

details.Title: Immortal Love: True Treasure Collector's Edition

description: Not all that glitters is gold...

title: My Friendly Neighborhood
description: Something scary is happening with everyone's favorite Saturday morning puppet show, Our Friendly Neighborhood! Play as Gordon, a repairman sent to get to the bottom of this disturbing dilemma. Fend off puppets and solve puzzles in this survival horror adventure.

title: Looking Inside Cells

details.Title: Looking Inside Cells
details.Developer: NYU CREATE Lab, NYU Future Reality Lab

description: Looking Inside Cells is a set of interactive Virtual Reality simulations for learning about cellular biology. Users can build cells by arranging their organelles, as well as transform them into specialized cells, such as red blood cells and e. coli bacteria.

title: Bubbles & Pearls
description: A VR arcade game that immerses you into an underwater experience, compete with your friends and family to achieve the longest dive and collect the highest number of pearls by collecting the bubbles that emerge from the abyss!

title: Overbowed
description: Explore a kingdom overrun by evil magic as you fight foes with your own magical bow.

title: Torden
description: A stylized 3rd person action fantasy game. Slash your way with many but simple attack mechanics. Select from dozens of spells to help in your battle. Featuring a wide array of enemies with different quirks that need your quick reflexes and patience to deal with.

title: Dragons On Desktop
description: Looking at these lovely dragons on Desktop makes me feel relaxed, free and happy. I hope to bring these emotions to you...

title: OZARK
description: A search and rescue gone wrong, crash landing in a remote mountain. A derelict facility, signals lost. Nothing is quite as it seems. Fight for your life in this side-scrolling action adventure and unravel the mysteries that lie beneath.

title: Zhijiang Town
description: 你是然比，在架空的小镇上肆无忌惮地和妹子们玩耍（绝对清纯）

title: Help Me Remember, Satori-sama!
description: Satori's overworked herself into bed, but Okuu needs help remembering things! You can't use her heart-reading power, and will instead have to ask questions and use her power of recollection to correct wrong info, all while enduring visits from Orin and Koishi as you deduce what Okuu's forgotten!

title: Golfing In Aether
description: Multiplayer minigolf designed around a procedural course layout allowing you to experience something different everytime you play. Support for both online play and four player split screen.

title: 无畏海域：征途

details.Title: 无畏海域：征途
details.Developer: 无锡上宸信息科技有限公司

description: In a certain sea area in the future, when your fleet is invincible, you will praise yourself for discovering this game!

title: End it, please ...
description: End it, please ... is a casual and challenging sci-fi platformer game where you have to find your ship to escape.

title: Malice in Magic Tower -玲鈴魔塔-

details.Title: Malice in Magic Tower -玲鈴魔塔-

description: "Malice in MagicTower -玲鈴魔塔-" is a magic tower (fixed-value strategy RPG) game. It's simple yet deep, and it's fun to improve your score through trial and error. Strengthen the main character, Malice, and defeat various enemies.

title: Night Blood : Avenger's Tide
description: "Night Blood: Avenger's Tide" is a side-scrolling action game that takes place in the world's most prosperous city, Atlandi. Players need to control Mark to find his own past, break through the enemy's siege, and finally uncover the huge conspiracy hidden behind the crisis.

title: Four Winds Fantasy
description: The speedrunning action/RPG you've been dreaming of! Take control of an elderly man who has been banished by the only town he's ever known. Discover insane secrets and multiple endings, compete on the leaderboards, now with full gamepad support!

title: 模拟医院-Simulated hospital
description: 模拟医院是一款模拟医院经营的沙盒养成游戏，整体风格轻松，硬核模仿医院运行，治病救人，救死扶伤，还要不断提升医院等级，最终达到三级特等医院水平。

title: SpectrumGames
description: The good old Mafia in a virtual space, as close to the offline version. Become the Game Master, invite players and build the game atmosphere as in real life! Or find an open room to join as a player.

title: Gematombe
description: Gematombe is an action-puzzle-vs-game where you can play one-on-one matches against your friends or the computer.

title: The Castle Of Time
description: This is a fighting platformer with a dynamic combat system where you have to fight enemies with your sword.

title: Déjà Drift
description: Drift with yourself to get a high score in a vaporwave sandbox. Rack-up points to the sound of Eurobeat music.

title: PANDO Engines
description: A 2.5D, Online Co-op Party Game where players work together to create their own massive land engine. Whether the different threats by manning turrets, putting out fires, shoveling coal, repairing segments, and performing daily maintenance. How long will you survive?

title: Ancient Medieval Empire
description: Ancient Medieval Empire is a strategy game with RPG elements. A huge number of free castles and villages, which greatly attract the evil orcs. Manage your army, capture new castles and fight back against enemies. You have to capture as many castles as possible and drive away the orcs.

title: SudoKube
description: An enhanced sudoku experience, 6 times more fun

title: The D-T.E.A.M.
description: Dwarves. Tanks. Energy. Ammo. MMMGold! In this 3D Tank Blaster Platformer, you will take down an enemy mining facility, all the while finding energy pickups and collecting sweet gold. Double jump, speed boost, and blast your way to earn performance stars and achieve a personal best in time!

title: Parkonauts
description: Parkonauts is a physics-based co-op game for one to four players. Park cars, refuel and wash them to collect money for the next day!

title: Take the Throne
description: Take the Throne is a massively multiplayer battle royale game with up to 25 players in a free-for-all bloody fight to be the last one alive.

title: Spirit Hunters: Infinite Horde
description: You are the Spirit Hunters in this action rogue-lite. Slay huge waves of monsters and harvest their souls for ever increasing power. Unlock many playable characters, abilities, maps and more through a deep progression system.

title: Draft Day Sports: College Basketball 2022
description: Draft Day Sports: College Basketball 2022 puts you in the role of head coach of your favorite college basketball team. Every decision can be made by you from staff hiring, recruiting, scouting and all the way to making each substitution to lead your team to tournament glory and becoming a dynasty.

title: Elteria Hunter
description: The world of Elteria is full of magic and monsters, And the Elteria Hunters are there to fight these monsters and protect the regions from evil. Level up your skill grind for equipment and become the strongest hunter!

title: A HERO AND A GARDEN
description: Play as a fairytale hero and help him garden, since saving the princess didn't go that well. A fantasy gardening visual novel and clicker game.

title: TumbleWeed
description: An inventive merge of classic tower defense and roguelike looting. Towers are loot! Tower enhancements are loot! Consumables are loot! Adapt and use your resources wisely to make it to the end!

title: R'lyeh
description: A story-driven, open-world, Lovecraftian Horror and Survival game with a scifi twist.

title: PSYCHO
description: PSYCHO - is an exciting 3D shooter with hardcore elements where you will explore an abandoned psychiatric hospital playing as a fighter SWAT.

title: Super Mini Mart
description: Super Mini Mart is a cozy take on the management genre with a charming 3D aesthetic and an endearing cast of characters. Stock, supervise, and manage store activities in a laid-back environment, befriending locals and turning those one-off bargain hunters into life-long loyal customers!

title: Orkhon Inscriptions Mongolia VR
description: An animated VR tour to the Orkhon Inscriptions in Northern Mongolia. Old turkic runic inscriptions from AD 700-735. For Oculus Quest version please contact me.

title: Gunsmith Simulator
description: Become a gunsmith and work in your own workshop! Craft parts and make popular weapons with them. Repair and upgrade weapons in a state of damage.

title: Sharp Trouble
description: Sharp trouble - King, wake up, we're under attack! Evil barbarians have invaded your castle and are trying to take out the entire treasury - stop this outrage in this hardcore platformer!

title: Cosmoblaster Exodia
description: Cosmoblaster exodia - You are a brave captain of a galactic cruiser. Ruthlessly destroy the space pirates you meet on your way and collect bonuses that will help you in your difficult task!

title: Scapegoat
description: Scapegoat is a fun 2D top-down, Action Shooter game with cartoon and beautiful hand-drawn scenery. Fight multiple enemy animals, choosing and mastering an increasing variety of weapons to advance through the levels. Designed for both Keyboard/mouse or Gamepad controllers!

title: Sprites at Play
description: Fast platforming, people hiding, others seeking. If you are the last one to be found you win!

title: The Last of Samual
description: Welcome to a new galaxy! You are Samual, a simple farmer that lives in a small abandoned town called First Valley. You live there with your daughter Sam who is the light of your world. One day you are attacked and your daughter is taken away from you!

title: DopeMine Arena
description: DopeMine Arena is a Bullet-Heaven Roguelite. Simple controls and auto-firing weapons put the focus on levelling up and making good choices to survive the onslaught of enemies. Earn coins to increase the stats of your characters. Discover the weapons and items that pair together .

title: Aces Under the Moonlight™
description: Action Sports is about to get a shot of pure fire. Run, jump, and Airdash your way to victory in this hand animated, high speed, punk-inspired ball game set against backgrounds of urban decay. Get ready an absolutely electric experience.

title: 1000 hidden snails
description: Hidden object game in a surreal style. Extremely hard!

title: Sanator: Elmo's Legacy
description: Sanator: Elmo's Legacy is a branching visual novel that follows the adventures of a certain plague doctor. What secrets do the Ailur people hold, and who St. Elmo really was? Venture into the heart of the frozen Taiga and find the answers.

title: Art of Stunt
description: Become the king of stunts! Show off your stunt skills in a variety of movie scenes like a Hollywood action movie star!

title: WAVECADE
description: WAVECADE is a sci-fi, arcade-style, shoot-em-up where YOU control the speed of the game. Destroy blocks in style as you collect powerups and avoid hazards. How far can you go? Set your own rules and unlock your favourite mode to play.

title: Netspectre
description: Netspectre is a hacker roguelike set in a ruthless, cyberpunk universe. Infiltrate networks, improve your machine, navigate the challenges of daily life as a netspectre in a futuristic megacity, and perhaps even become one of its many legends!

title: PI.EXE
description: Take the role of an antivirus software within the world of an operating system, eliminating malware spawns in a challenging, platforming quest!

title: Beastmaster
description: Build, explore and survive in a struggle for survival against animals and mutants on a mysterious island.

title: Tray Racers!
description: The world ended…But the fun didn’t! Race solo, or with your pals across the adorable post-apocalyptic world of Tray Racers! Grab a tray, surf the dunes, and get ready to SLIDE, DRIFT and TRICK your way to the finish line in this cute and colorful party racer, built for online multiplayer! YAHOOOOOO!

title: Potatoes
description: Potatoes is a puzzle/platformer game in which you control multiple characters by recording what should they do. Make potatoes collaborate to reach the objective in 50 different levels of increasing difficulty!

title: Nine Sols
description: Nine Sols is a lore rich, hand-drawn 2D action-platformer featuring Sekiro-inspired deflection focused combat. Embark on a journey of eastern fantasy, explore the land once home to an ancient alien race, and follow a vengeful hero’s quest to slay the 9 Sols, formidable rulers of this forsaken realm.

title: The Moonlight Circus
description: In this first-person VR-Horror game, you wake up in the middle of an empty circus arena, with a syringe in your arm and the feeling of being watched. Solve puzzles and discover clues to unveil the tragic backstory and find your way out.

title: Tanks, But No Tanks
description: A stylized top-down shooter, where you'll find yourself evading increasingly difficult foes while ricocheting bullets around unique level layouts. Use a diverse array of weapon types, ranging from a triple-shot to freezing bullets to take on equally as diverse enemy types.

title: Unaware
description: Gather your strength and find information about your whereabouts. Explore the area. Find and assemble all the puzzle pieces. This way you will learn about the dark past.

title: COPS 2170 The Power of Law
description: COPS 2170: The Power of Law is a hybrid of RPG and tactical strategy. The central storyline unfolds in the future where the cyberpunk culture and a highly-urban oriented society have populated North America.

title: Paranormal Motel
description: Cindy is a receptionist at the Paradise Motel. She begins her night watch. She takes care of customer requests as usual. But that evening unforeseen events will terrify Cindy

title: Back 2 School
description: Back 2 School is a trivia game with challenging primary school questions that the player must answer to graduate from elementary school. Are you smart enough to pass elementary school? Play Back 2 School today and work out those brain muscles!

title: Dere-chat
description: An Interactive Visual Novel with 35 story branches, 150 unique lines of dialogue, unlockable skins and many wholesome vibes! Dere-chan is always kind, happy, and energetic so whatever happens she'll always be there with kindness and support!

title: Brunch Rush
description: Brunch Rush is a Gameboy inspired RPG where you play as Claire, a young waitress at Lily's Diner, as she tries to make some money over the summer. Things don't go as planned.

title: Cat Adventure 2
description: Do you love complex platform games with beautiful graphics? Then the game Cat Adventure 2 will be a real find for you. In this game you will face the most difficult traps and obstacles that you will encounter on the way. Pass the most difficult levels and rush to victory in this game!

title: Frog Fall Down
description: Frog has fallen into a sinkhole, and only you can help him out of the pit while dealing with some of the most janky and unfair physics you'll ever see in a precision platformer.

title: QUIT TODAY
description: "QuitToday" is a side-scrolling game around the workplace theme. You will step into an epic resignation adventure and kick your colleagues' asses.

title: Underling Uprising
description: Play as the Underlings, a group of experiments created by evil mad science, as you seek revenge on your previous captor, the maniacal Dr. Baldrick! On their journey, the Underlings will need to fight across the globe, overcome the demons of their pasts, and accept help from unexpected places.

title: Turbo Overkill
description: Johnny Turbo needs to clean up Paradise, a cyber city overrun by augmented minions under the cult control of the world's most advanced AI, Syn, who's looking to expand to world domination if not stopped here and now. Wall-running, Turbo Time, chain saw leg augments, flying cars and lots of booms.

title: Undesired Shift
description: Evan and Aviary have been cast into the dream of an angel, where unknown forces prevent them from returning to their reality. Confronted by two mysterious figures and assailed by monsters, Evan and Aviary must fight and determine the truth of the angel's dream

title: Neura Mechanicus:Prologue
description: Neura Mechanicus is a turn-based squad tactics game where you operate robot squads in tournaments, each with unique abilities, upgrades and different game mechanics. Enter a cyberpunk world full of strange homemade robots and challenging teams vying to be the best at tournaments.

title: Dotto Botto
description: Dotto Botto: a classic Super Mario Bros. style platformer game.

title: Hidden Post-Apocalyptic Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

title: Sweet Transit
description: Sweet Transit is a unique city builder where the railway is king and trains are the sole means of transportation. Quaint villages will expand to bustling cities, farms to industrious factories, and steam-powered rail to combustious diesel... and beyond in this interconnected, train-driven world.

title: EVAN QUEST 2
description: EVAN QUEST 2 - Bad Dudes have taken over the city again. The DoD sends in Evan Quest to stop them. Clear the Bad Dudes from several progressively challenging levels.

title: Stalked
description: It's a late night and you're returning home from work , you will face your worst nightmares ,Weird things start to happen and you're getting chased by a stalker.Will you escape your home and find out what's happening or just die ?

title: Bukkaku
description: The indie game is of experimental genre with mostly horror elements. Bit of survival with sci-fi and RPG elements. A story between life and death in a stylized game origami world. Bukkaku created by Lukas Reznicek aka RZE.

title: Bones and Magic
description: Bones and Magic is a tower defense game in which the player uses towers and traps to stop enemies. Use your magic wand and build various traps and towers to eliminate all enemies. Collect crystals from enemies and buy upgrades for your traps.

title: Inyoku Shoujo
description: Inyoku Shoujo is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

title: DRUNKKNIGHT
description: DRUNKKNIGHT is a 2D top-down roguelike in which you feel like a knight who decides to storm a cave full of fantasy monsters on his drunken head begins to lose his mind.

title: Cursed Blood
description: Cursed Blood - This is a slasher with RPG elements, in a medieval setting, with a dark and gloomy atmosphere.

title: Late photographer 3
description: This is a game of drawing cards and collecting cards.

title: Bingus: My Beloved
description: Bingus: My Beloved is a visual novel and dating sim where you choose to pursue Bingus or Big Floppa while you attend Zabloing Academy. Join your favorite high school club, make friends, and prepare to enter the Floppaverse!

title: Astra Wing
description: Sci-Fi Rail shooting in 3D with no gimmicks. Enjoy a simple addicting slice of the genre shooting and dodging and barrel rolling through over ten levels with quick cutscenes in between each while fun tunes pump along to your space piloting.

title: Everblade
description: Avenge a crumbling world in this varied platformer. Jump, fight, climb, and fly through worlds full of hazards and puzzles. Discover hidden treasures and develop new skills and devastating attacks to aid in your fight against the hordes of evil. Will you succeed and restore order to the world?

title: VR Mini World Roller Coaster
description: This game is a casual and entertaining game where players will experience the surprise of the microscopic world under a unique perspective. You can freely control the speed of the roller coaster, so that you can stop to admire the scenery carefully at the same time as the high-speed excitement.

title: RogueClick
description: An incremental RPG where you fight creatures, unlock equipment, and vanquish bosses!

title: HARDDRIVE
description: A 2D Run'N'Gun shooter set in a two-way universe where Electronic circuits are at war with the world of Books. You are a hard drive miraculously surviving a battle and reborn on a pencil’s farm. Fight with sharpeners, pens and other primitives to destroy King B.

title: Healer&Phoenix

details.Title: Healer&Phoenix
details.Release Date: ADD TO WISHLIST - discount at launch

description: A visual novel with a pet healing mini-game about a mythical animal veterinarian, a magnificent phoenix, love and saving the world. Will you heal all the animals of a mysterious magical sickness or will the world be destroyed by evil magic? Find love, make choices, and get one of the 10+ endings.

title: The Creature of Chaos
description: Frantic FPS game with very procedural levels

title: Vacant Planet
description: You awaken on an unknown planet that has been devastated by a virus of some kind. Scavenge gear and get ready for a battle of survival. Do anything you can to live and find out the secret behind the tragedy of your new home. and find out what's wrong with it.

title: Koncolos
description: "Do you know a monster that dwells around here?" she asked. An ordinary barkeepers' journey, intertwined with the only survivor from a shrouded monster hunter company, started with this question.

title: ISOLATE
description: You, who needed money, will participate in a secret biological experiment. You will play a 'Game' in a huge cellar for two weeks and have to survive the attack of numerous 'Entities'. What are those 'Entities', and who is waiting at the top of the cellar?

title: Anicon - Animal Complex - Party
description: The final chapter to Anicon - Animal Complex, a romance, comedy, fantasy Visual Novel.

title: Dandy & Randy DX
description: Play either alone or with a friend on this cute adventure game!

title: TEN - Ten Rooms, Ten Seconds
description: TEN is a challenging and brutal platformer in which you face a relentless gauntlet of ten-second deathtrap rooms in a desperate struggle to escape your fate... and find out what the hell is going on around here.

title: Super Gosu Cars
description: Arcade racing action mixed with kart racing combat! Up to 8 players in local multiplayer! Lots of different vehicles, drivers and tracks to try out and more yet to unlock! Go for gold in the Grand Prix! Hone your skills in Time Trial! Run wild in Custom Tournaments! - It's Super Gosu Cars time!

title: vision\memory\maze
description: vision\memory\maze - a maze game with visual memory and logic.

title: The Cruel Dreamer Marchosias
description: Join Wolf on their mission to right the atrocity committed against their family. Together with the mysterious entity 'Book', Wolf will brave the monsters lurking in the shadows, explore long-forgotten ruins and solve mysterious puzzles in order to reach an ancient castle located between worlds.

title: Prison Life
description: An online game that you'll play with 3-11 players as a Prisoner or a Guard and will try to escape or prevent escapes. Loot, Craft, and make your way to the exit, or investigate and arrest wanted players as a guard!

title: OverNight
description: So, are you up for a challenge? Can you survive the night with the Spirits at some of the most haunted locations in the world? And if you are afraid of ghosts and paranormal activities, you better team up with your friends because every horror is little less scary when you are not alone in the dark.

title: Adventure Fitness VR
description: Challenge yourself on this VR fitness game! Run, climb, and zipline through a diverse set of environment using arm swing controls and then get through high intensity workout stations ranging from battle ropes, archery, boxing, and more. It's a bit like running a VR triathlon.

title: Dissonance
description: Dissonance is a top-down 3rd person adventure game. Players will encounter supernatural anomalies and creatures. Find and use specialized gadgets to aid you in your journey. Explore the abandoned research facility and reveal the secret of the organization that sent you here.

title: Touken Ranbu Warriors

details.Title: Touken Ranbu Warriors
details.Publisher: DMM GAMES, KOEI TECMO GAMES CO., LTD.

description: "Touken Ranbu Warriors" is an action game that is a collaboration between the "spirits of blades" simulation game "Touken Ranbu -ONLINE-" presented by DMM GAMES and NITRO PLUS, and the thrilling "1 vs. 1,000" WARRIORS series of KOEI TECMO GAMES.

title: Dimakerus
description: Unleash your true power by facing highly intelligent enemies and fierce beasts, from the blazing sands of Egypt to the most marvelous capitals of Rome. Explore the ancient world as you unravel the mysteries behind the fall of the Western Roman Empire in a rich plot inspired by historical facts.

title: INU - A Glimpse of Infinity
description: INU is an atmospheric exploration adventure in an infinite 3D fractal universe. “Journey” meets “No Man’s Sky” in truly infinite, mesmerizing alien landscapes – not created more like discovered.

title: Search and Rescue
description: Turn-based, strategy board game for up to 4 Players! Search, Rescue and Survive!

title: Robovenger
description: Robovenger - In this action-packed platformer, you will take command of a very agile and bouncy robot! Your task is simple - collect as many rubies as possible in the mines and don't fall into the clutches of the enemy!

title: Save 2020
description: Help a fellow archer to overcome these big and evil monsters that are ahead, A challenging Run and Gun Game where your skills will be tested.

title: Ilum
description: An open-world game in ancient Babylon with elements of action, exploration and city destruction. Archaeologically accurate buildings such as the Tower of Babel and Hanging Gardens. Voice-acted in Akkadian language in a Biblical and Babylonian mythological background.

title: Stone Protectors
