description: 一个独立开发的，基于三国背景的回合制游戏。 配置武将阵容、洗练技能、打通主线关卡，每日可以参加很多副本活动。

title: Wrath of Anias
description: Explore the sandbox, collect treasures, and find your way off of the island.

title: Nea Edem
description: Explore a ruined city and shoot your way to the truth of the past in the first ever 3D game from the creator of the Lloyd the Monkey series.

title: Craft Hero - Prologue
description: Gather resources by day, build and recruit by noon, defend your village by night! A new minimalism sandbox survival with countless new ideas – Craft Hero

title: Rock Snake
description: Rock Snake is a game with classic snake gameplay, but unlike other games, this game has extremely high graphics!

title: Barbarous 2 - Tavern Wars
description: Join Emyr and the Barbarous party on an epic Time Management adventure!

title: Makis Adventure
description: Fight, dash, swim and bite your way through 4 different dungeons. Let the inner shark out! Face many different opponents and defeat powerful bosses. Makis Adventure is a pixel art platformer with a bite!

title: The Day We Met was a Regular Day in the Infinitely Looping Highschool, is That Normal?

details.Title: The Day We Met was a Regular Day in the Infinitely Looping Highschool, is That Normal?

description: The story tells a mind-boggling suspense-filled adventure story on campus. The game is played via two main elements: text interaction and scene decryption. If you are interested in text-based adventure games, science fiction, and a certain big big big big pink cat, please do not miss it.

title: The Day We Met was a Regular Day in the Infinitely Looping Highschool, is That Normal?

details.Title: The Day We Met was a Regular Day in the Infinitely Looping Highschool, is That Normal?

description: The story tells a mind-boggling suspense-filled adventure story on campus. The game is played via two main elements: text interaction and scene decryption. If you are interested in text-based adventure games, science fiction, and a certain big big big big pink cat, please do not miss it.

title: Fire Safety VR Training
description: Fire Safety VR Training Train your professional skills in Fire Safety VR Training safely and in full correspondence with international standards!

title: Side Effect
description: Side Effect combines a game of chess with a roguelike experience. Experiment, discover combos, carve out your own path by expanding your spellbook and collecting artifacts. Lose, learn and try again.

title: Basault VR
description: BASAULT VR is a virtual reality movement shooter. Run, jump, swing around on your grappling hook and shoot with a variety of complex yet familiar firearms. Use those tools to survive and reach the end of this roguelite!

title: Shattered Between
description: A dynamic roguelike shooter, where you can experiment with weapons and special abilities, wander through various rooms-worlds and defeat opponents! Will you pass the tests and reach the final goal?

title: Arto
description: Fight through unique biomes against challenging enemies and bosses as you piece together the mysteries of a broken world, in an action role-playing experience that paints a new path.

title: Lofi Hollow
description: A moddable ASCII semi-casual life simulator with permadeath options and multiplayer.

title: Grey Block
description: A 3rd-person, stealth adventure that asks the player to help Theo Church escape the Green Valley Psychiatric Hospital where he has been committed while unravelling the conspiracy that landed him there.

title: Revenge of the Killer Octopus
description: Revenge of the Killer Octopus is a third-octopus game where you shoot and possess your way through throes of enraged scientists in order to take your revenge!

title: SOF - Spirits Of Freedom
description: Embark on this Epic Platform-Style Adventure, Inspired by the Most Iconic Games Ever. Race with WOLFY, and Fly with FOXY on a journey to save your home with the help of the Rainbow Spirits and their friends.

title: Chimeras: Mark of Death Collector's Edition

details.Title: Chimeras: Mark of Death Collector's Edition

description: An open-and-shut case is suddenly reopened by a violent murder!

title: Surface: Strings of Fate Collector's Edition

details.Title: Surface: Strings of Fate Collector's Edition

description: Can you save your sister from a sinister game?

title: Roly Poly
description: Play as a Roly Poly and roll into adventure!

title: Legend of Radiance
description: Start on your fantasy adventure in this completely nonlinear souls-like! Place Life Stones in the world to create your own 'bonfires' as you cut through the challenging enemies, and seek out the six Divine Rings to stop the Demon King!

title: Slide 'Em Up
description: A cute puzzle game where you slide along a grid, assassinating guards to get to the exit!

title: Mayday: The Survival Island
description: A sudden plane crash interrupts our hero's journey, leaving him on a deserted and unexplored island, now he must use all his knowledge and skill to survive and return home. Explore, builds, hunts and fights as he tries to survive the mysteries of this island.

title: KONGFU VR
description: The earth was invaded by the demon race again.This time, they have gathered ancient fierce beasts. As one of the most valiant warriors, Defend them with your weapons! - Defend! The! Frontier!

title: Jump Like An Egyptian
description: Our game is an endless platform game. You have to jump to the next platform within 20 seconds by racing against the clock. Your goal is to reach the highest score by passing the most platforms in the shortest time.

title: BeatNClean
description: Our goal is to move forward in the subway we are in before any of our Life or Cleaning bars comes to an end. Depending on the situation, you can collect the garbage in the subway so that your cleaning bar does not fall or you can beat the gang members who cross your path in the subway.

title: Endlanders
description: Build your deck, glitch through enemies, translate unknown languages and decipher the mysteries of this universe, in this grid-based real time combat indie game. Endlanders features two main characters with diverging storylines in the same universe, fighting their way through unknown planes.

title: Popplings
description: Popplings is a competitive puzzle game. Strategise your line clears to beat your opponents, both locally and online! Play through the various modes and try to best your skill in all of them!

title: Lumencraft
description: Desperate, outnumbered and with gun turrets as your only companion. Lumencraft is a top-down shooter with base-building elements. Drill through fully destructible environment to reach precious resources, and spend them on weapons and tools protecting the last bastion of humanity.

title: Retro Karting 22
description: Welcome to Retro Karting 22. Your reaction time, decision making and driving skills will be tested to the limit! Choose your character and kart and drift your way to victory! Race your own ghost images in this single player, time trial based, indie karting game.

title: Mirror Shoot
description: In Aranet, space is connected through mirrors. You are an agent in Aranet and you need to learn the physics in this planet and fight for resources.

title: Chaos Girl
description: The seal of the millennium was broken, and evil came back to the world. Only those who possess the power of Chaos can seal the evil again. You will experience an adventurous journey against evil.

title: Yum Collector
description: Yum collector - Deciding to change your life dramatically, you take care of a little dog from a shelter, but bad luck - he is constantly very hungry! Tidy up your kitchen by matching identical treats together to feed your voracious pet

title: Pixel Trouble
description: Pixel trouble - In this unusual platformer, you take on the role of a dim-witted knight who decided to become famous by accomplishing several feats. He chose the ghosts who fled from the cemetery as his goal, but here's the bad luck - the sword cannot injure the undead!

title: Sprout Lands
description: Sprout lands - Explore the green expanses of a fairy tale world in this platform game with the main character trying to harvest his crops from the beds that have been stolen!

title: Bullet Casters
description: Bullet Casters in an unconventional Shoot ‘em Up game with a local PvP mode where you can challenge your friends and create your own bullet hell or face a single-player mode that will test your skill and wits.

title: Thunder Helix
description: Pilot deadly helicopter gunships, battle enemy forces and complete dangerous missions within a thrilling desert warzone!

title: Instant Artist: Puzzle Mashup
description: What happens when you mix four jigsaw puzzles? A mess, right? WRONG! You instantly become an ARTIST! This toy helps you create unbelievable montage puzzle art effortlessly. So you can share with your friends and show the world what a great artist you are!

title: Gordian Rooms 2: A curious island
description: Your adventure continues in Gordian Rooms 2... The escape island game where you venture further into the mysteries of the Gordian Society! Challenge your wits and conquer every puzzle on the Isle of Lye!

title: Minishoot' Adventures
description: Minishoot' is a cute and unique adventure game that mixes up open exploration with crispy twin-stick shooter action. Fight your way from the shiny overworld to the deepest caves, improve your ship and overcome the dungeons' bosses to rescue your friends!

title: Arena Drift Master
description: Your main goal is to destroy all the objects in the arena while drifting.

title: Reimei no Gakuen - Otome/Visual Novel
description: A visual novel of modern-day fantasy, bonds, and a mystery that brings misery to the children born with a strange power.

title: 毛玉大冒险
description: A Story about Kedama in Gensokyo. This is a fan game basedon Touhou Project.

title: Battle 19XX
description: Battle 19XX is a 2D side-scrolling and easy-to-play war game where players need to lead their army to defeat the enemy, and at the same time, they need to go into battle to fight the enemy. A simple resource system, diverse arms, and weapons upgrade your weapons immediately to fight together.

title: Halve
description: Help two separated spirits find their way in a vast, puzzle-based fantasy world while simultaneously working together to overcome different challenges and unravel their destiny.

title: POP BATTLE
description: Once a classic battle game, reborn and upgraded. The traditional charging mode and the simple parabolic mode coexist, and the classic heroes and new heroes have their own characteristics. Retain the original flavor, richer hero skills, and more types of team combinations.

title: The Masters: Survival
description: Tana (Katana) is testing the new Virtual Proxy Simulation, which is going to be used for training, as she fights the evil creatures known as the Shadow Dwellers. All is not what it seems however as she dives deeper into the system and faces off against an old foe, Master Nether.

title: A Series of Temporal Mishaps
description: A Series of Temporal Mishaps is a platformer set in distinct eras of earth's history. Travel through time, steal the secrets of the ages, and run, jump, and puzzle your way home. The only catch: you're not very good at time-traveling.

title: Chemists: Area of infection
description: A year after the global catastrophe, you woke up in a hospital and don't remember anything. You have to not only find out what happened, but also try to survive in this harsh dangerous world.

title: Turbeton
description: Turbeton is a competitive multiplayer game in which two players go head-to-head, waging a strategic fight for control of the Afterlife.

title: No Exit : Torments of Hell
description: No Exit is a fast grappling game that pits you against several environmental challenges of hell. Time your swings and glide skull demon to safety. It is Imbued with most beautiful hand-painted artwork with enchanted musical score and narrates personal journey through pain.

title: King Rabbit - Race
description: Race with friends through dangerous obstacle courses in this action-platformer. Hop quickly to survive obstacles, compete with friends, and win prizes. Enjoy infinite replayability, leaderboards, customizations, cross-platform support, and perfect controls.

title: King Rabbit - Race
description: Race with friends through dangerous obstacle courses in this action-platformer. Hop quickly to survive obstacles, compete with friends, and win prizes. Enjoy infinite replayability, leaderboards, customizations, cross-platform support, and perfect controls.

title: Lost Melody
description: Lost Melody is a third person survival horror game, combining the cuteness of the characters and the mystery atmosphere. “Levi” had woken up to a place he was not very familiar with. He had to solve various puzzles to find clues of the missing sister "Lucy" who is trapped in a dream.

title: Clocknockers 2
description: BAD DUDES HAVE FROZEN TIME ALL OVER THE WORLD. YOU HAVE TO RETURN TIME TO NORMAL AND SAVE THE PEOPLE OF EARTH.

title: Fire Safety VR Training
description: Fire Safety VR Training Train your professional skills in Fire Safety VR Training safely and in full correspondence with international standards!

title: Fantasylandia World
description: Fantasylandia World is a big open world map which takes you back about 4000 years ago!

title: The Past Within
description: The Past Within is the new co-op experience from Rusty Lake! Play together with someone you deem trustworthy: one in The Past, the other in The Future. Observe and communicate what you see around you. Solve the puzzles and uncover Albert Vanderboom’s plan.

title: Manacircle
description: Manacircle is a combat adventure game about exploring the deep unknown and discover a new world. Unique characters and strong enemies will test your skill. The journey to find the true meaning of Manacircle has begun!

title: Hell Pie
description: Hell Pie is an obscene 3D platformer that takes bad taste to the next level! Hell Pie sees you grab the horns of Nate, the ‘Demon of Bad Taste’. He is given the honorable task of gathering the disgusting ingredients for Satan’s infamous birthday pie!

title: Losted
description: You wakes up in an old castle and cannot even remember your name. What is the year now? What kind of place is it? How to get home? There are so many questions, the answers to which can only be found by solving the many cunning mysteries of this mysterious place...

title: Mini Gardens - Logic Puzzle
description: Connect the hose to sprinklers of your garden and watch your 🌹flowers🌻 instantly grow revealing a beautiful scene. Mini Gardens is a logic puzzle game.

title: Wordies
description: Wordies is bringing a word game you've most likely played & enjoyed to Steam. But it's harder than before, with only 5 guesses you're given the not so easy task of guessing a common American word! Guess the daily word & build up highstreaks to compete against the world in our global leaderboards!

title: Skullnight
description: Skeletons, dolphins and neon - that's what awaits you in the 2D indie arcade Skullnight! You will find a lot of puzzles and mini-games that will test the strength of your and your abilities!

title: Frisson
description: Frisson is a top-down single-player game that places you in the seat of a sadistic game-maker that forces people in an arena to make them fight to the death until only one person remains. Watch as they interact with the world and forms strategies to survive.

title: Steinstern
description: Space Action Shooter with RPG elements and loot. Find your way through a variety of procedurally generated space mazes. Test your skills and your luck with many different weapons and configuration possibilities! Play alone in single player or in local coop mode with dynamic split-screen.

title: Gravitar: Recharged
description: The cult classic Gravitar has been Recharged. Complete missions in each solar system, navigating a variety of challenging environments, each with varying levels of gravity that will test your skills as a pilot before unlocking new solar systems to explore.

title: SpellTome
description: SpellTome is a story driven fantasy adventure 2D platformer. Hurl balls of magic, dash across levels, and jump over obstacles while trying to get the fabled SpellTome.

title: Ball Game
description: Ball Game is an upcoming round-based racing game where you and up to 15 other players compete head-to-head to be the fastest on the track (inside of a bouncy ball, of course)

title: Dungeons & Dragons: Dark Sun Series
description: Unleash your imagination into a vast, savage world, sun-scorched and wind-scraped. This series contains the radiant classics, Dark Sun: Shattered Lands, and Dark Sun: Wake of the Ravager.

title: Project Medved
description: What do you know about the risk if you haven't danced with a mutant to incendiary tracks? Find out about it in the musical horror.

title: Dungeons & Dragons: Krynn Series
description: Return to the first fantasy role-playing epic set in the legendary Dragonlance game world of Krynn. This immortal pack includes Champions of Krynn, Death Knights of Krynn and The Dark Queen of Krynn.

title: Dungeons & Dragons - Al-Qadim: The Genie's Curse

details.Title: Dungeons & Dragons - Al-Qadim: The Genie's Curse

description: Experience the mysterious Al-Qadim game world and prepare for arcade-style combat and role-playing genre - all in the style of Arabian Nights! Diverging from the Gold Box formula, Al-Qadim allows you to experience the immersion and thrill of an AD&D adventure with a condensed role-playing system.

title: Dungeons & Dragons - Stronghold: Kingdom Simulator
description: Run your own kingdom in the legendary Dungeons & Dragons game world. In this remarkable kingdom simulator, your goal is to become Emperor by building and expanding your stronghold in competition against opposing computer-controlled kingdoms.

title: Shotgun, Dungeons, Laser Traps
description: A first person puzzle shooter. Shoot boxes, push bombs, fend off enemies, find a way out of laser-mechanical traps.

title: Alephant
description: A word-less abstract puzzle game about language.

title: Deep Space Outpost
description: Deep Space Outpost is a space station building & survival game, involving resource and base management. Build your space station tile by tile, mine asteroids, refine materials and keep your station operational.

title: REBEL
description: REBEL - is a 3D shooter with surviving elements where you will have to fight with a prison rebel.

title: Lionel the Dragon
description: A dark and Moody 2.5D, story-driven action puzzle game based on a child with a worrying view of the world.

title: STAMP

details.Title: STAMP
details.Release Date: TBA - Add to WISHLIST! Demo is available now!!!

description: "STAMP" is a very exciting shooter where your main job is to KILL zombies and complete the main task. Meanwhile you have a lot of stuff to try like perks, new weapons or side quests.

title: SimVoiceAssistant
description: SimVoiceAssistant is an addon that provides voice activated checklists functionality for any flight simulator. When used with Microsoft Flight Simulator it provides additional functionality.

title: Trainz Plus
description: Drive, Explore, Operate and Create the railroad of your dreams - and now collaborate in real time with Multiplayer Surveyor! And with Trainz Plus memberships, you get more content, more features and the latest Trainz has to offer!

title: Blackjack Avenue
description: Blackjack Avenue is a casual Blackjack game where the user can simulate a Casino Blackjack Experience.

title: 我死后的那些天-After Death
description: This is a suspense game, you are sitting in front of the TV, the news is broadcast: last night a young girl was killed, the body was found in a deep alley. And the girl who was murdered -- you. You are involved in a serial murder, and you are reborn as a female journalist.

title: Flock of Dogs
description: Flock of Dogs is a fantastical road trip through the sky with co-op for 1-8 players, LOCAL and/or ONLINE. Ride flying dogs. Crew a skywhale that serves as your floating home. Then battle monsters, explore stormy skies, and help folks along the way to the Flying Festival at the end of the Air River.

title: Anime Manga Style Girl - Color By Number Pixel Art Coloring

details.Title: Anime Manga Style Girl - Color By Number Pixel Art Coloring

description: This is a coloring game with 54 different anime-style illustrations.

title: Batsumaru
description: BATSUMARU is a short and minimalist puzzle game.

title: Go Ace It
description: Go-Ace-It is a runner game that challenges your gaming skills as you progress through our levelling system and unlock upgrades that spice up your gameplay. Join us now, and cement your place on the GoAceIt Leaderboard!

title: The Tribe Game
description: The Tribe Game is a story-driven roleplaying game where the player creates their own custom character to explore an atmospheric post-apocalyptic world (where hope prevails) and to be instrumental in creating a better future. Inspired by the classic cult-hit TV series, 'The Tribe'.

title: Three Mazeketeers
description: Help these girls to finish the task by journeying through the labyrinth. Use different forms to see different perspectives and to tackle various challenges. Solve puzzles, make ways through the labyrinth, and find the source of the problem by utilizing all the abilities you have.

title: Mortal Darkness
description: “One grim dawn and noble I wake, The darkness is rampant, our oath shall break. A noble warrior soon shall rise, and clear the air of the darkened skies.”

title: Space Piercer
description: make your way into their fleets to destroy them on their own field !

title: Ignited Steel: Mech Tactics
description: Ignited Steel is a mech roguelike turn-based-tactics game. Manage a team of overheating old-tech mechs, more heat means more vulnerability and damage! Unravel the galaxy’s story as you travel from node to node, improving your mechs, acquiring new pilots, and defeat the sentient A.I. overlord!

title: Virtuoso
description: Grab an instrument and get ready to jam in Virtuoso, your own virtual music stage! This VR musical sandbox lets anyone play and perform music in new, immersive ways. Explore a range of unique instruments made for VR and share your tracks with the world!

title: Lightedge
description: Lightedge is a role-playing game set in a medieval fantasy world, which aims to evolve this classic genre by introducing several new gameplay mechanics inspired by other videogames.

title: Forgotten Realms: The Archives - Collection Three

details.Title: Forgotten Realms: The Archives - Collection Three

description: This package celebrates the elements of the AD&D video games that you know and love - vast dungeons and beautiful locations to explore, a wide variety of monsters to slay, quests to complete, adventurers to assemble and worlds to be saved.

title: NecroArcher
description: Run & gun action arrow shooting game with precise platforming. Game with retro style graphic and modern gameplay. You can upgrade your archer with special items and new weapons available on the map and in stores.

title: With Good Intentions
description: The Age of Blade and the Age of Gun entwined. The master of the knights and the imperial captain are separated by centuries, but bound by memory. Solve the mysteries of the cursed abbey and its immortal lord. Rejoin the link of time. Find out where the road will take thee with good intentions.

title: Koni: The Secrets of Castle
description: Classic Sokoban game set in Koni's castle from the fantasy world of Chronicles of Sarval. Solve challenging puzzles and discover the secrets of Koni's castle.

title: Blood Camp
description: "Blood Camp" is a horror game inspired by the horror movies of the 80's. With ps1 graphic style and a classic story from old cult movies.

title: Alley Twitch Bot

details.Title: Alley Twitch Bot
details.Developer: Alley Catz Games, Hazy Paw Games

description: Alley Twitch Bot is a convenient stream bot for streamers. It's a twitch chat bot that helps you get more effective interaction with audiences. Alley twitch bot will always focus on improving streaming experience.

title: Jessica Mysterious Journey
description: Featuring innovative hidden object gameplay and an intriguing storyline, Jessica. Mysterious journey is a thrilling escape for the whole family.

title: Jessica Mystery of Courchevel
description: Jessica Mystery of Courchevel is a classic hidden object game with a gripping storyline and lots of minigames. This time Jessica has to go to a winter ski resort.

title: Jessica Secret of the Caribbean
description: Jessica Secret of the Caribbean is a classic hidden object game with a gripping storyline and a lot of mini-games.

title: Push the Sheep
description: A puzzle game where you have to push the sheep to make each one graze.

title: ShapeGrid
description: ShapeGrid is a casual puzzle game. Find your way through different shapes and colors. Solve 70 hand-crafted puzzles or compete against other players in endless mode!

title: Elemental Roll
description: Betrayed by his own servants, Byle - The former King of Hell - was exiled from his kingdom to the Human World. Now Byle rolls through a world much larger than him looking for a way back home. Attempt to always go faster and reach new heights to get Byle's strength back !

title: Maze Dungeon
description: Maze Dungeon is a 3D voxel rogue-lite game. Cleanse a maze-like castle full of monsters and defeat the castle's corrupt king to escape!

title: Fantasy Fishing Town
description: Welcome to Fantasy Fishing Town! Cute pixel graphic x side scroll fishing. It's a unique pleasure! Legendary fish! You're mine!

title: Comrade Quack
description: Comrade Quack is a fun, hybrid, third person tower defense game aimed at young adult audiences! Play as Comrade Quack to defend the Mother Pond from filthy Capitalist Pigs with an array of combat turrets, barriers, and more!

title: Pedro and Sofia's Nuclear Winter
description: A fantasy adventure across a nuclear-torn America! Play as Pedro and Sofia and set out on a quest in this open-world, 3D/2D role-playing game!

title: The Pest
description: Solve challenging puzzles and avoid dangerous traps of the computer defence system in this puzzle-platformer game about a tiny optimistic computer pest heading to the System's Core. Will he plunge our world into chaos, or will he have mercy? It's up to you.

title: Reptilian Rising
description: When genocidal Reptilians invade from out of time, only the greatest heroes in history can stop them! Assemble a team of humanity’s best from Cleopatra to Einstein and stop the Reptilian Rising in this totally tubular turn-based strategy, time-traveling battle for humanity’s survival (no pressure).

title: 次元乱斗 Dimension Fight
description: "Dimensional Brawl" is a multi-team brawl type action game. People from nowhere, throwing punches for no reason, just to prove they're better?

title: Sunset World Online
description: ▶ Fire ▶ Water ▶ Earth ▶ Wind - which class is for you?Gather your party and embark on an adventure to the Edge-World in a unique non-P2W 2D Side-Scroller MMORPG! Enjoy an open world full of life, exploration, roguelike expeditions & challenging boss fights together with friends or on your own!

title: Heroes of The Sacred Tree
description: Heroes of the sacred tree is a game that mixes beat em up with shotter and platforms.

title: PREMORTAL VR
description: PREMORTAL is a medieval VR-only game. Explore and survive the procedurally-generated wilderness. Gather resources and craft gear. Build formidable bases. Overcome all boss trials to ascend!

title: Earth is too small for me

details.Title: Earth is too small for me

description: A simple TPS game. The strongest man is back. Manipulate "The Strongest Legend" and infiltrate the enemy dungeon. Of course, please don't forget to rescue the lady !

title: G.E.T.
description: G.E.T. (Gather, Explore, Technologize) is a 3D first person open world adventure-survival game. On your journey you will progress through different ages, beginning from the stone age and finishing in the far future.

title: Amazing Girl
description: Amazing Girl is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

title: daydream 白日夢
description: This is a campus daily galgame, I hope you like it. 这是一款校园日常galgame，希望大家能喜欢。 これは日常系&学園モノのギャルゲーです。皆さん楽しんでいただけたら幸いです。

title: Food Truck Simulator
description: Renovate, equip and restore the shine of the food truck that belonged to your father. Create recipes, cook the food and serve customers across an entire city. Customize and upgrade your food truck to reach more customers and expand your menu.

title: Bicycle Rider Simulator
description: Bicycle Rider Simulator is a relaxing game where it's just you and your bike, ride, overcome obstacles, enjoy the scenery and birdsong.

title: Undeads vs Humans
description: A Tower Defense with deck of cards. Unlock cards and build your own deck to beat the levels. Easy to play but hard to master.

title: RoBo: The Allectric Idventurer
description: In a world where humans’ souls were transferred into toys, plug into RoBo and join Robin, a creative Dyslexic kid, on an electric adventure through her memories & the Solar City. Head into an action-puzzle platformer, where you will be tackled by crazy challenges & overcome the SteamPunk Gang.

title: Presidents Fight
description: The fighting game that pits presidents from around the world against each other in hand-to-hand combat. The most fun way to resolve international conflicts.

title: Crabby Beach
description: Crabby beach - Crab migration season is in full swing! You need to help the main character get to the water, bypassing dangerous obstacles and intrigues of poachers who want to shoot as many crabs as possible!

title: Heart attack
description: There are ghosts in the dark, in order to survive you need to light your way, but all the items for this are limited.

title: The Nightmare Inside
description: The Nightmare Inside is a short first-person horror game filled with puzzles connected to an amazing story.

title: Islets
description: Take to the sky and reunite a fragmented world in this surprisingly wholesome metroidvania! Help Iko adventure across beautiful hand-painted islands, receive letters from a quirky cast of characters, and face powerful monstrous adversaries.

title: Zombie VS Police
description: Zombie VS Police is an incredibly addictive third-person shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world infested with zombies. In this game you have to play as a police officer who fights zombies and protects his hometown!

title: Evasion from Hell
description: Escape all 9 circles of hell by showing off your 3D platformer skills. A terrifying yet beautiful world full of surprises, challenges and lost souls is waiting for you. Will you be able to escape from hell?

title: Hex Rally Racers
description: Race through spellbinding worlds on magic brooms and craft crazy hexes to leave your opponents in the dust in this action-packed, magical arcade racer!

title: Peaky Blinders: The King's Ransom
description: Infiltrate their criminal underworld, earn the Shelbys’ trust and prove you have what it takes to join the Peaky Blinders in The King’s Ransom, a dark VR action-adventure based on the epic gangster drama.

title: Princess Pyro
description: !! The sun is GONE . . . Princess Pyro's searing fire powers are the only hope to revert the mysteriously sudden nightfall and fight back the encroaching forces of darkness. Jump, dash, and fireball across Pyro Castle in flashy retro-cade style!

title: Dagada's Story
description: Dagada's Story is a 2D puzzle-platformer game set in a colorful retro-style world with an emphasis on puzzles and exploration. Solve ancient mysteries, climb dangerous snow-capped mountains and discover a great story with lovable characters in this Mario, Celeste and Limbo inspired world.

title: Metal Voyager
description: It's your one way ticket to midnight! A side-scrolling heavy metal guitar shooter. Blast your enemies with pure metal energy from your astral guitar as the backing track rages in the night. Featuring a fleet of surreal hand drawn space monsters and an arsenal of cosmic items to whomp them with.

title: Virtual AI - Lily
description: Talk to character in the VR world. it is possible at VirtualAI!

title: Night Racer
description: Enjoy this Indie racing game featuring cross-platform multiplayer, many levels, championships, cars, skins, boosts, toppers and more

title: Dustland Rider
description: IT'S THE YEAR 2272. A powerful solar flare scorched Earth and destroyed cities all around leaving the planet to ruins and scattered survivors. The Dustlands are what's left – pirates, ghost towns and the seven settlements. Survive & thrive in a post-apocalyptic future - opportunity calls!

title: Dreams in the Witch House
description: Dreams in the Witch House is an open world horror adventure game, where you guide Walter Gilman, as he prepares to face the dreaded May-Eve witch ritual in the legend-haunted city of Arkham. Choose your own approach and reveal the secret of the Witch House before it's too late.

title: Vertical Kingdom
description: Vertical Kingdom is a roguelite that mixes cities and cards. Due to the fact that there is not much space, you have to build vertically, with the help of platforms and other constructions. You will go on expeditions to obtain resources that will help you improve your camp for your next trips.

title: The Eternal Battlefields
description: The Eternal Battlefields is a turn-based tactical game with RPG elements and a loot system, emphasizing on battles. Get a random army in the High Score mode and try to reach the highest level of The Eternal Battlefields or try to beat the final boss in the Roguelike mode.

title: Signum Perfectum
description: Collectible card game where opponents fight in turns casting magic upon each other.

title: Mini Maker: Make A Thing
description: A hero thing, a monster thing, a robo thing… in Mini Maker, you can make any ‘thing’! Use an arsenal of plastic limbs, wonky tools, rainbow stickers and googly eyes to assemble creations, please demanding clients, and laugh in the face of perfectionism.

title: Sharing Lights
description: Gather all your grey matter and enter the dungeon. Sharing Lights is a 3D isometric puzzler in which you control multiple Ghosts at the same time. Manage their lights and use their abilities cleverly to reach the Architect and find the exit.

title: Super Slinger
description: Super Slinger is a cute and funny pixelated arcade-like shooter where you fight against the alien invasion in an attempt to send them back home. Cute art, juicy gameplay, difficult stages, and SLINGSHOTS!

title: Defense Club: Rouge Patrol
description: A teenage sergeant leads her girls into a post-apocalyptic conflict. Can the bonds of friendship withstand the tides of war? Your choices will decide in this fully-voiced visual novel with RPG elements.

title: HellFull - The Last Hope
description: Immerse yourself in a unique post-apocalyptic world that has now become Hell on earth. Destroy your enemies with a variety of weapons, ranging from Pistols to Assault Rifles. Explore to look for survivors, health kits and hidden zones. If you die, you have to start over just like the real deal!

title: Nitro Nation VR
description: Nitro Nation VR is an immersive virtual reality drag racing live game experience for car enthusiasts and newcomers alike. Compete, feel the torque, interact with cars in a new way, customize your garage, vehicles, and celebrate car culture!

title: Plague Lords
description: The investigation of multiple disappearances in the midst of the Black Death turns into a bloody stand against a new mysterious threat. Survive in a turn-based, tactical sandbox, managing a settlement and dozens of peasants, craftsmen and warriors to stop the upcoming Scourge.

title: Foreign Galaxies
description: After a galactic portal failure you find yourself lost millions of light years away from home, in a foreign galaxy... With your main propulsion systems disabled you are unable to traverse space, so you try to collect resources you find near you in order to create a galactic portal to return back.

title: Paint To Pixel
description: Paint To Pixel is a Virtual Reality exhibition that charts the history of UK graffiti. It features interviews with prominent UK artists and personal photo archives that cover 6 decades of graffiti writing.

title: Oldowan
description: Oldowan is a casual survival sandbox game that is focused on very early humanity and how it developed. The crafting is all based on real practices, but the survival aspects are relaxed.

title: STRANGER
description: Protect yourself against a STRANGER trying to break into your house, use the limited locks and look and listen where the intruder is coming from. Lock the windows, reset the power, stay focused. Survive until 6am and begin to unravel the mystery behind your sudden and mysterious STRANGER

title: Fiasco Restoration and Repair
description: Fiasco Restoration and Repair is a game about free-form art restoration without any of the proper tools or know how. The only resources available to you are those you can scavenge from the garage. Improvise solutions to complex problems, make mistakes, and restore the artwork no matter the cost!

title: Project XMAS
description: Project XMAS is a retro style, horror, single - player game where you need to return to your home... The map is completely procedurallygenerated so every approach will be differend and specific.

title: Scorpion Overdrive
description: Descend to an alien planet where you will steal the planets most valuable resource, while hordes of giant alien bugs sting, stab, claw and shock you to no end. You must hold them back from destroying the equipment and somehow stay alive to enjoy a nice payday.

title: Hidden Floating City Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

title: Soulbaby: Remastered
description: An original roguelite experience combining bullet-hell and traditional, turn-based RPG elements. As a newfound hero, endure countless waves of enemies as you shape your identity, increasing performance attributes and learning new skills, on a journey to uncover the mystery of a fading cosmos.

title: Hidden Western
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

title: Run Away SkyDancer
description: You have escaped the used car parking lot and must run away thru the town to freedom.

title: DROP
description: DROP is a rogue-like hacking simulator set in a fragmented future. You are a freelancer, trying to gain fame in DROP, an anonymous system for hackers. You break into digital enclaves and leave without a trace, but you find yourself in a conflict between various agencies that could change the world.

title: The Asfrixa
description: Trapped in an installation made for "Asfrixa's", you'll have to go through your worst nightmares and puzzles to find your way out before being consumed by the shadows along with the place.

title: Polar Bear Riding A Ninja
description: Endless runner with roguelite elements. throw pineapples to defeat enemies while running away from a polar bear riding a ninja. Chose items to throw better, jump higher and defend yourself.

title: Hellscape
description: Hellscape is a "Based-Text" Adventure game. Similar to Text-Based games from the 80's, with a lighthearted twist, and way more balls jokes than ever necessary.

title: PIPELINE RTX
description: PIPELINE RTX is a strategic puzzle game. The goal of the game is impossibly simple: you need to turn the various parts of the pipe into certain positions, so that in the end the water can, albeit with a large number of meanders, but pass through the water supply.

title: Gardenia VR
description: A laid-back combination of a gardening simulator and a fairy tale adventure. Help Wood Grandpa clean the island and restore its beauty so that its former inhabitants can return to their homes. Take photos of your garden compositions, relax and discover the secrets.

title: Lootbox RPG
description: The satisfying dungeon crawler

title: SworLd
description: SworLd is a physics-based VR action game. You can compete with other players with cold weapons like swords and spears.

title: Robo Maestro
description: Play with music like never before! Robo Maestro is a procedural music toy. Guide an endless stream of new music or make detailed tweaks in Editor Mode. Create songs, be inspired and share your creations. No music skills required, just have fun!

title: Routine Feat
description: Summer days and no one around. Routine feat. The agony of isolation and abandonment. No violence, no haste, no conflict, except fighting your doubts. Swifts, butterflies, sunset rays on the leaves of trees; radio, notebook and pencil; typewriter; bus; overwhelming loneliness.

title: On the Hunt
description: Become a top class hunter polish your shooting skill to perfection!

title: SønderDø
description: You have to survive the night until 08:00/8 AM. The only thing you have by your side is your flashlight. It is especially hard to maneuver around the school since the teachers can hear you inside an area.

title: Raid on Taihoku
description: Raid On Taihoku is an adventure game with the backdrop of WW2 Taiwan. By controlling the characters pass through different danger and safe zones, you will experience the struggles of human nature and cruelty of war.

title: One Step After Fall
description: Immerse yourself in the depressing thoughts of Steve Robinson, learn his story and face your fate in this incredible narrative experience.

title: Serious Fun Football
description: Serious Fun Football is a football game with real ball physics and realistic feeling of movements and shooting. Control one specific player or whole team. Each footballer has an unique set of attributes. Gather your friends and play online or offline!

title: Phil Alone
description: Phil Alone is a horror/puzzle game based on old Escape The Room games. Try solve this huge puzzle with a lot of different endings.

title: Escape To School
description: Escape To School is an action game where you have to get into a school and get all requiered items to leave it. There is a tutorial where you will learn the mechanics of the gameplay. The final goal is to Escape the school in short time. You can try to beat your highscore every time you are playing.

title: the DEEP LOST
description: the DEEP LOST is a first-person psychological horror game.story driven, able to experience interiors, suspense and fear.It offers mystery, curiosity and discovery together with its visually dynamic atmosphere.There will be moments of horror.

title: Rising Sun VR
description: Step into the role of being a keeper of your own Japanese garden. Players can relax peacefully among this Japanese Strolling Garden, by completing day to day tasks and enjoying the sights and landmarks.

title: Spirited Thief
description: Spirited Thief is a tactical stealth game with a quirk: take your time to scout and plan your heist, then break in to steal pricey gems under increasing pressure.

title: Pls Kill it.
description: Use your FPS expertise and beat it!! The enemy AI in the game will follow the player's behavior and try to surpass you; please do your best to defeat it, it may perform beyond your expectations, and the rest will surpass you!

title: The Sacred Acorn
description: Tansira is in peril, and the only one that can save it is you. Play as Ima, an adorably courageous squirrel, and explore a beautiful, mysterious land. Solve puzzles, discover secrets, defeat corrupted enemies, and make strange, cute friends that will guide you on your quest.

title: Ero Manager
description: As a new guy, he is so nervous to report to his direct boss that he has never met before, but he didn't expect it to be a stern female boss like a queen. But this is what it looks like, but in reality, no one knows about her inner feelings. Challenge her bravely, and you may find out her secret.

title: 飞蛾
description: 太空生存探险建造类游戏，玩家需要驾驶自己的飞船，在浩瀚的宇宙中航行，探索发现的飞船与空间站遗迹，收集材料、资源，打造飞船，升级设备，制造武器。在保证自己活下去的前提下，寻找幸存人类。

title: Rescue Team: Heist of the Century

details.Title: Rescue Team: Heist of the Century

description: Priceless works of art are disappearing from galleries all over the world! Natural disasters occur simultaneously with these heists! As the head of a rescue team you will have to do the impossible - stop earthquakes, deal with hurricanes and find out who is behind this monstrous crime.

title: Fireworks Show VR
description: Welcome to Magnificent Bay City! Listen to the music in the evening and enjoy this wonderful auto-generated fireworks show! You can also release fireworks in a variety of colors or customize your fireworks show in the fireworks show studio!

title: B-RAIN
description: It is a game that must survive as long as possible by matching the color of the player with the bullets flying from all directions.
